Are They Heufalling Apart?

Aster Cometwing • January 13, 2025

Last updated: 13 January 2025, 19:40 RST

Heufauna has narrowly avoided Amujization today, as it and the surrounding lands have become part of one whole union. This union, known as the CMCic Federation, has yet to make an official announcement on the ŋorld stage. Either way, this development has the Quing of Rauratoshan cautiously optimistic.
